claims.claim: The system often tries to take credit for the successes of those it has marginalized.
claims.quote: it's amazing to me how they will kick us in the teeth every chance they get and then try and take credit for us.

claims.claim: Individual success often happens despite systemic barriers, not because of systemic support.
claims.quote: I did this despite you, I was not gonna become a statistic.

claims.claim: Being free from parole or probation is significant for personal achievement and autonomy.
claims.quote: It's the first time that I've been not been on parole. Probation or some form of incarceration since 1985.

claims.claim: Determination and self-reliance are critical for overcoming the challenges imposed by the criminal justice system.
claims.quote: I told my parole agent when I came out, you're gonna get to count me as a victory.
